Class LoanService

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
application.LoanService
public class LoanService extends Observable
Service responsible for borrowing, returning, and tracking loans.

Coordinates with repositories, applies borrowing rules, and notifies observers about overdue loans.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LoanService()
    Creates a service with default rules and repository.
    LoanService(BorrowingRules borrowingRules, LoanRepository loanRepository)
    Creates a service with explicit rules and repository.
    LoanService(LoanRepository loanRepository)
    Creates a service with a provided repository and default rules.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoanService

      public LoanService()
      Creates a service with default rules and repository.

    • LoanService

      public LoanService(LoanRepository loanRepository)
      Creates a service with a provided repository and default rules.
      Parameters:
      loanRepository - repository to use; if null, a default instance is created

    • LoanService

      public LoanService(BorrowingRules borrowingRules, LoanRepository loanRepository)
      Creates a service with explicit rules and repository.
      Parameters:
      borrowingRules - borrowing rules; if null, defaults are used
      loanRepository - repository; if null, defaults are used

  • Method Details

    • borrow

      public Loan borrow(String isbn, String userName)
      Borrows a book identified by its ISBN for the given user. Applies rules and saves the loan with a standard due date.
      Parameters:
      isbn - book identifier
      userName - member email/username
      Returns:
      created loan

    • addLoan

      public void addLoan(Loan loan)
      Saves a loan in the repository.
      Parameters:
      loan - loan to save; must not be null

    • returnBook

      public void returnBook(String isbn, String memberId)
      Returns a borrowed book, marks it as returned, and applies fines if overdue.
      Parameters:
      isbn - book identifier
      memberId - member email/username

    • findOverdues

      public List<Loan> findOverdues(LocalDate today)
      Finds and applies fines to all overdue loans as of the given date.
      Parameters:
      today - current date
      Returns:
      list of overdue loans

    • scanAndNotifyOverdues

      public void scanAndNotifyOverdues(LocalDate today)
      Scans active loans for overdues and notifies observers once per loan.
      Parameters:
      today - current date

    • showAllLoans

      public void showAllLoans()
      Logs all active loans to the console.

    • getOverdueLoansForMember

      public List<Loan> getOverdueLoansForMember(String memberId, LocalDate date)
      Returns overdue loans for a specific member as of a date.
      Parameters:
      memberId - member email/username
      date - current date
      Returns:
      list of overdue loans

    • countActiveLoans

      public int countActiveLoans()
      Counts active loans in the repository.
      Returns:
      number of active loans

    • countReturnedOn

      public int countReturnedOn(LocalDate date)
      Counts loans returned exactly on a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - target date
      Returns:
      count of returned loans

    • findLatestLoans

      public List<Loan> findLatestLoans(int limit)
      Returns the latest loans limited by a count.
      Parameters:
      limit - maximum number of loans
      Returns:
      latest loans

    • getAllLoans

      public List<Loan> getAllLoans()
      Returns all loans.
      Returns:
      list of loans

    • findOverdueLoans

      public List<Loan> findOverdueLoans(LocalDate date)
      Returns overdue loans as of a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - current date
      Returns:
      list of overdue loans

    • hasActiveLoans

      public boolean hasActiveLoans(String memberUserName)
      Indicates whether a member has active loans.
      Parameters:
      memberUserName - member email/username
      Returns:
      true if active loans exist

    • borrowMedia

      public Loan borrowMedia(Member member, Media media, LocalDate borrowDate)
      Borrows generic media for a member using default media rules.
      Parameters:
      member - member entity
      media - media entity
      borrowDate - borrow date
      Returns:
      created loan

    • borrowMedia

      public Loan borrowMedia(Member member, Media media, LocalDate borrowDate, Integer customDays)
      Borrows generic media with a custom number of days. If days is null or non-positive, defaults to media borrow period.
      Parameters:
      member - member entity
      media - media entity
      borrowDate - borrow date
      customDays - optional custom days (>0)
      Returns:
      created loan

    • returnMedia

      public void returnMedia(Loan loan, LocalDate returnDate)
      Returns media associated with the loan and marks it returned.
      Parameters:
      loan - loan to return
      returnDate - date of return (currently informational)

    • calculateTotalFinesForMember

      public double calculateTotalFinesForMember(Member member, LocalDate today)
      Calculates the total fines for all loans belonging to a member.
      Parameters:
      member - member entity
      today - current date
      Returns:
      total fines

    • borrowMediaTestDuration

      public Loan borrowMediaTestDuration(Member member, Media media, LocalDate borrowDate, int days, int hours, int minutes, int seconds)
      Testing-only borrow with custom days/hours/minutes/seconds. Creates and tracks a testing-mode loan with a wall-clock expiration.
      Parameters:
      member - member entity
      media - media entity
      borrowDate - borrow date
      days - testing days (>=0)
      hours - testing hours (>=0)
      minutes - testing minutes (>=0)
      seconds - testing seconds (>=0)
      Returns:
      created loan (tracked in testing-mode list)

    • borrowMediaTestDuration

      public Loan borrowMediaTestDuration(Member member, Media media, int seconds)
      Testing-only borrow with a duration expressed in seconds. Creates and tracks a testing-mode loan with a wall-clock expiration.
      Parameters:
      member - member entity
      media - media entity
      seconds - testing duration in seconds (>0)
      Returns:
      created loan (tracked in testing-mode list)

    • getTestingModeLoansSnapshot

      public List<Loan> getTestingModeLoansSnapshot()
      Returns a snapshot of active testing-mode loans.
      Returns:
      immutable snapshot of testing loans

    • removeTestingModeLoan

      public void removeTestingModeLoan(Loan loan)
      Removes the provided loan from testing-mode tracking.
      Parameters:
      loan - loan to remove; ignored if null

    • findOverdueTestingModeLoans

      public List<Loan> findOverdueTestingModeLoans()
      Finds testing-mode loans whose testing timer has expired.
      Returns:
      list of expired testing-mode loans
